title: Single Black Female
overview: Single Black Female follows Monica, who's reeling from the death of her beloved father and a difficult breakup, ready to move forward with her life as she tries to land the new hosting job for an afternoon talk show. When the station hires her a new assistant, Simone, the two quickly become close friends as Simone moves in next door and completely immerses herself in Monica's life. But underneath her sweet exterior, Simone harbours a dark secret and as time goes on cracks in her fa√ßade begin to appear. Monica decides to sever ties once and for all with Simone, but Simone has other plans and is determined to take over Monica's life for good.
